roleset.name: soak up
roleset.note: ABSORB-V NOTES: Frames file for 'absorb' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Member of VN Class absorb-39.8, learn-14-2. (from absorb.01-v predicate notes)
ABSORPTION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry absorb.01. Framed by Anwen, Feb 2011. (from absorption.01-n)

role.descr: sponge, arg 1 is absorbed into this, when separate from cause
Source of liquid, absorbed from what?

example.name: absorb-v: losses
example.text: [Allstate]-1 is expected *trace*-1 to absorb another big hit in the fourth quarter as claims pour in from the San Francisco earthquake.
example.arg: as claims pour in from the San Francisco earthquake

example.name: absorb-v: With source Arg 3...What habit?
example.text: The habit is very bad because salt absorbs water from the meat.

example.name: absorb-v: passive with arg0
example.text: Perhaps [the fiscal shock of tax cuts]-1 is after all best absorbed *trace*-1 by floating rates

example.name: absorption-n: With Arg1 only
example.text: Ascorbic acid may enhance iron absorption.

example.name: absorption-n: With Arg0 and Arg1
example.text: Patient X's Vitamin D absorption has been diminished due to his Crohn's Disease.

example.name: absorbed-j: with arg 2
example.text: George W. Bush, still by his own account given to "heavy drinking," absorbed *none* in changing the name of his chronically failed Arbusto Energy Oil Company to Bush Exploration...
example.arg: *none*& -- > George W. Bush, still by his own account given to "heavy drinking,"
in changing the name of his chronically failed Arbusto Energy Oil Company to Bush Exploration
